sentence.Network_en: The woods were aflutter with birds.
The flag was aflutter in the air.
Stunned, he became all aflutter. I resented his carelessness.
sentence.Network_cn: 他吓得手忙脚乱, 我恨他大意.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... afloat 飘浮的 aflutter 飘扬的 afocal 无限远.
a. 飘扬的ad. 飘扬同反义词同: [a.] nervous 英英解释形容词解释: excited in anticipation [同] aflutter, nervous 帮小D改进本词.
all are aflutter at the thought of his return ., 想到他的归来 , 大家都很激动.
《疯狂英语2003合集全部文本》（三） ... ) drunken a. 酒醉的 ) aflutter a. 飘动的，鼓动的 ) gutter n. 水槽.

list.abs: To be aflutter with sth ., 因 . . . 而惊慌.
If it sets your heart aflutter , I will take away my eyes from your face ., 如果它使你心震颤 , 我就把眼光从你脸上挪开.

auth_sentence.content: He began as an exuberant young pup setting teen hearts aflutter with his homely good looks.

auth_sentence.content: Once you take flight on this airy escape, you're bound to be all aflutter.
